scripts.prepare: npm run build && npm run setup
scripts.build: npm run copy:pkg && npm run fix:tsconfig && cd temp && yarn && yarn add ts-runtime --dev && cd ..
scripts.setup: mkdir temp/lib && mkdir temp/bundles && mkdir temp/algorithms-e && npm run fix:code:init && npm run build:docs && npm run build:pkg
scripts.reset: cp -a temp/algorithms-e/. temp/algorithms && rm -r temp/lib && mkdir temp/lib
scripts.test:pkg: npm run reset && npm run build:pkg
scripts.test:tsr: npm run reset && npm run build:pkg && npm run build:tsr
scripts.test:fix: npm run reset && npm run build:pkg && npm run fix:code && npm run build:tsr
scripts.fix:tsconfig: cp temp/tsconfig.json temp/tsconfig.json-e && cp fix/tsconfig.json temp/tsconfig.json
scripts.fix:docs: sed -i -e 's%(Math\.abs(bench\.hz - hz) / hz \* 100)%(Math\.round( (Math\.abs(bench\.hz) / hz \* 100) \* 100 ) / 100)%g' docs/assets/astrobench.js && sed -i -e 's/% slower/%/g' docs/assets/astrobench.js
scripts.copy:pkg: rm -r temp && mkdir temp && cp -a node_modules/pretty-sort/. temp
scripts.build:tsr:
cd temp && node_modules/.bin/tsr $(find algorithms -name '*.ts' -not -name '*spec.ts' | tr '
' ' ' | xargs)  -fec tsconfig.json && cd ..
scripts.build:docs: npm run amd && cp node_modules/astrobench/dist/astrobench.js docs/assets/astrobench.js && cp node_modules/astrobench/src/style.css docs/assets/astrobench.css && cp node_modules/requirejs/require.js docs/assets/require.js && npm run bundle && cp temp/bundles/bundle-pkg.amd.js docs/assets/bundle-pkg.amd.js && cp temp/bundles/bundle-tsr.amd.js docs/assets/bundle-tsr.amd.js && npm run fix:docs && npm run reset
scripts.bundle: npm run test:pkg && npm run bundle:pkg && npm run test:fix && npm run bundle:tsr
